==Details==
===Description=== Shards are an item dropped when defeating any kind of Pokemon. These typed shard can be invested into the Shards tab to increase type effectivity, and your damage output.
===Helpful tips=== The shard types reflect whatever type(s) the Pokemon defeated were. Defeating Pokemon in a Dungeon give you 3 Shards of whatever types the Pokemon was, however defeating the boss will give you 20 Shards. Pokemon in Gyms give you 5 shards each, and Wild Pokemon on Routes give you 1.
